name: For The Record
description:
≺ About ≻

⋅ For The Record's current purpose is to repopulate the Roblox Marketplace / Library with meaningful audio pieces for everyone's delight. Whether it be using audio for experience ambience, to having vibe music to hang out with friends, at our best capacity in accordance to Roblox guidelines this shall be done. At the same time, we partner with organizations that cherish this vision of bringing lively music back to the user experience, so be sure to check out our music selection, as well as our partners, when you can!

≺ Support ≻

⋅ Join our server via the community links for the latest information and upload announcements!

≺ Links ≻

⋅ Information [Out of Date]
https://devforum.roblox.com/t/1201601 

⋅ Audio Library [Out of Date]

shout.body: Greetings, friends alike. This group is a bit out of date with its description and is operated for use of Game Studios of Bloxy Awards groups nowadays, however we will republish everything we have and moreso soon. https://create.roblox.com/roadmap
